siteMetadata.title: Felix Ortmann - Freelance Cloud Engineering & Cloud Architecture
siteMetadata.description: Do you want to scale your business as you grow? Consider moving to the cloud with me! I have strong experience with public cloud providers like Scaleway, AWS and GCP. I specialize in designing microservice architectures, and provide proficiency with many programming languages.
siteMetadata.author: github.com/0snap
